description: This Kotlin source file defines the NotesAdapter class, which is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying notes in a list within an Android application. The adapter manages the rendering of each note, handles user interactions such as clicks and long presses, and efficiently updates the list using DiffUtil.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter that renders a list of notes with click and long-press interactions, utilizing DiffUtil for efficient updates.

methods.description: Binds a Note object to the ViewHolder to display note details.

methods.description: Populates the ViewHolder's views with data from a Note object and sets click listeners.
